name: Polkabooth
description:
Welcome to Polkadot’s #ParachainsAreHere campaign!


​​This is a community competition leading up to the Polkadot Parachain Party online event happening on December 18th.

50 participants will be selected to win a limited edition Polkadot Christmas sweater!



Are you excited about parachains coming to Polkadot? Then this competition is for you!


As Polkadot closes to its final launch stage, join the #ParachainsAreHere campaign to help spread the word about the first parachains on Polkadot, to learn more about the main benefits of parachains and its formats, and to celebrate this milestone by updating your Twitter avatar in the Polkadot way. All you have to do is run through tasks, for points that rank you higher on the leaderboard.
